name: Blocky and Boxy
description:
In this minimalist puzzle platformer, you control 2 characters, Blocky and Boxy, to their respective exits. To do that, you need the 2 of them to help each other.

Tools used:

- Godot 3.5

- GIMP

- Audacity

- Cakewalk

Music: Soul and Mind by E's Jammy Jams

Everything else was made by me.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.
